definition: (arch.) minister/official/noun prefix denoting function or status/a youth

sentences.english: Any lines or pipe under pressure should not be hammered on.
sentences.chinese: 不能用𨱍头砸带压力的任何管线。

sentences.english: Some have even been arrested and imprisoned for crimes committed by their doppelgangers.
sentences.chinese: 有些人甚至因为冒用者所犯下的罪行而𨱍铛入狱。
